extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system a new installation?
Is the system using GENESIS64 v10.97.3 or earlier?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Latest GenBroker32
extracted_playbook.description: Do not install the included GenBroker32. Instead, download and install the latest GenBroker32 from ICONICS.

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Permissions on ICONICS Folder
extracted_playbook.description: Verify the permissions on the c:\ProgramData\ICONICS folder do not include 'Everyone'. If 'Everyone' has access, remove it.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove 'Everyone' Access from ICONICS Folder
extracted_playbook.description: Remove 'Everyone' access by changing permissions on the ICONICS folder.

extracted_playbook.title: Update ICONICS Suite
extracted_playbook.description: Update the ICONICS Suite with the latest security patches as they become available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets.
